awards.text: Nominated for 4 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 1 win.

fullplot: John Lewis is bored by his librarian's job and henpecked at home. Then Liz, wife of a local counciller, sets her sights on him. But this is risky stuff in a Welsh valleys town - if he and Liz ever manage to consummate their affair, that is.

title: Only Two Can Play
